descriptionHtml:
Update: 20-03-12

If you want a version of this mod that will be Compatible with TCG Tradable companion gear go here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13145

Update: 11-3-2012
I moved the CustomUthgerd.esp into the Data folder of the Archive.

Installation Instructions:

CustomUthgerd.esp should be in the Skyrim/Data folder. 

then in the: 

Skyrim/Date/meshes/actors/character/facegendata/facegeom/skyrim.esm/000918E2.NIF 

Skyrim/Data/textures/actors/characters/FaceGenData/FaceTint/Skyrim.esm/000918E2.dds 


Discription:

This is mostly a cosmetic make-over of Uthgerd. I did make her more focused on 2 hand weapons, gave her lightfoot, 1 level of Barbarian and 1 level of Juggernaut. Her class is now Combatwarrior2H and her combat style is csHumanBozz2H.

I also uploaded 2 pics of the settings in Creation Kit if you don\'t want to use the mod but make your own Mod. If you make your own mod or modify this one make sure once you close a characters \"Actor\" Window you highlight the character in the Object Window and press Cntrl+F4 to regenerate the characters FaceGenData. She is Not set to Essential in this mod.

I use:

Better Females by Bella by BellaGailSkyrim (minus the femaleuppereyesocket.dds) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812 

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709 

UNP Female Armors WIP by Exeter 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7305
author: Kevgav
